strapiPost.title: MIXD Gallery Highlights Humanity's Relationship With The Environment Second Art Drop
strapiPost.content:
MIXD Gallery in Rogers unveiled its second art exhibition last weekend. Titled Natural Beings, the collection explores the relationship between a creature and its environment.

  • Northwest Art-kansas: MIXD Gallery bridges Bentonville's renowned museums and the U of A's School of Art in Fayetteville, opening a space for the diverse group of artists in the Ozark region to host creative conversations and showcase local talent through quarterly drops.
  • Connected: Natural Beings exhibition features traditional landscapes and portraiture highlighting the interconnected relationship between humanity and our natural surroundings, exploring how one subject may affect the other.

Natural Beings will be on display until May 24. Learn more HERE.
